code: function initialState(){return{count:0};}var countReducer=function countReducer(){var state=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:initialState();var action=arguments.length>1?arguments[1]:undefined;switch(action.type){case"INCREMENT":return{count:state.count+1};case"DECREMENT":return{count:state.count-1};default:return state;}};export default countReducer;
